casebody.data:
HAZELTINE RESEARCH CORPORATION et al., Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. Harold Mertons SCHWAB, Doing Business as Radio Shack, Defendant-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 20, 1926.) No. 60. Samuel Rubin, of New York City, for appellant. William H. Davis and R. Morton Adams, both of New York City, for appellees.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
